SA20bsa030_u:4: MSA_1.1 arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute vācā padaiścāmalair duḥkhasyottaraṇāya duḥkhitajane kāruṇyatastanmayaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:5: dharmasyottamayānadeśitavidheḥ satveṣu tadgāmiṣu śliṣṭāmarthagatiṃ niruttaragataṃ pañcātmikāṃ darśayan //
SA20bsa030_u:6: MSA_1.2 ghaṭitamiva suvarṇaṃ vārijaṃ vā vibuddhaṃ sukṛtamiva subhojyaṃ bhujyamānaṃ kṣudhārtaiḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:7: vidita iva sulekho ratnapeṭeva muktā vivṛta iha sa dharmaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti //
SA20bsa030_u:8: MSA_1.3 yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavaddarpaṇagataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayati nṛṇāṃ darśanavaśāt /
SA20bsa030_u:9: tathā dharmaḥ sūktaprakṛtiguṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthastuṣṭiṃ janayati viśiṣṭāmiha satām //
SA20bsa030_u:11: dharma[rmo] dvayavyavasthā[stho] vyañjanato 'rtho na ca[rthataśca] jñeyaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:18: MSA_1.8 pratyakṣacakṣuṣo buddhāḥ śāsanasya ca rakṣakāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:23: upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnameva tat //
SA20bsa030_u:33: yathākhyānaṃ nārthādbhagavati ca bhāvātigahanāt na dharme 'smiṃsrāso bhavati viduṣāṃ yonivicayāt //
SA20bsa030_u:34: śrutaṃ niśrityādau prabhavati manaskāra iha yo
SA20bsa030_u:36: MSA_1.16 tato dharmaprāptiḥ prabhavati ca tasminmatirato
SA20bsa030_u:38: MSA_1.17 ahaṃ na boddhā na gabhīraboddhā buddhau gabhīraṃ kimatarkagamyam /
SA20bsa030_u:39: kasmād gabhīrārthavidāṃ na mokṣa ityetaduttrāsapadaṃ na yuktam //
SA20bsa030_u:40: MSA_1.18 hīnādhimuktaḥ sunihīnadhātor hī naiḥ sahāyaiḥ parivāritasya /
SA20bsa030_u:42: MSA_1.19 śrutānusāreṇa hi buddhimattaṃ labdhvā'śrute yaḥ prakarotyavajñām /
SA20bsa030_u:43: śrute vicitre sati cāprameye śiṣṭe kuto niścayameti mūḍhaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:44: MSA_1.20 yathārute 'rthe parikalpyamāne svapratyayo hānimupaiti buddheḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:45: svākhyātatāṃ ca kṣipati kṣatiṃ ca prāpnoti dharme pratighāvatīva[pratighātameva] //
SA20bsa030_u:46: MSA_1.21 manaḥ pradoṣaḥ prakṛtipraduṣṭo ['yathārute cāpi] hyayuktarūpaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:47: prāgeva saṃdehagatasya dharme tasmādupekṣaiva varaṃ hyadoṣā //
SA20bsa030_u:52: MSA_2.1 ratnāni yo hi śaraṇapragato 'tra yāne jñeyaḥ sa eva paramaḥ śaraṇa[ṇaṃ] gatānām /
SA20bsa030_u:54: MSA_2.2 yasmādādau duṣkara eṣa vyavasāyo duḥsādho 'sau naikasahasrairapi kalpaiḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:56: MSA_2.3 sarvān sattvāṃstārayituṃ yaḥ pratipanno yano jñāne sarvagate kauśalyayuktaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:57: yo nirvāṇe saṃsaraṇe 'pyekaraso 'sau [saṃsṛtiśāntyekaraso 'sau] jñeyo dhīmāneṣa hi sarvatraga evam //
SA20bsa030_u:58: MSA_2.4 śaraṇagatimimāṃ gato mahārthāṃ guṇagaṇavṛddhimupaiti so 'prameyām /
SA20bsa030_u:59: sphurati jagadidaṃ kṛpāśayena prathayati cāpratimaṃ mahā[rdhaṃ]dharmam //
SA20bsa030_u:70: MSA_3.4 prakṛtyā paripuṣṭaṃ ca āśrayaścāśritaṃ ca tat /
SA20bsa030_u:84: MSA_3.11 aikāntiko duścarite 'sti kaścit kaścit samudghātitaśukladharmā /
SA20bsa030_u:86: MSA_3.12 gāmbhīryaudāryavāde parahitakaraṇāyodite dīrghadharme ajñātvaivādhimuktirbhavati suvipulā saṃprapattikṣamā ca /
SA20bsa030_u:87: saṃpattiścāvasāne dvayagataparamā yadbhavatyeva teṣāṃ tajjñeyaṃ bodhisattvaprakṛtiguṇavatastatprapuṣṭācca gotrāt //
SA20bsa030_u:110: MSA_4.9 dharmeṣu ca satveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve /
SA20bsa030_u:135: mahārhacittodayavarjitā janāḥ śamaṃ gamiṣyanti vihāya tatsukham //
SA20bsa030_u:137: sukhena duḥkhena ca modate sadā śubhī kṛpāluśca vivardhana, dvayam //
SA20bsa030_u:138: MSA_4.23 yadānapekṣaḥ svaśarīrajīvite parārthamabhyeti paraṃ pariśramam /
SA20bsa030_u:139: paropaghātena tathāvidhaḥ kathaṃ sa duṣkṛte karmaṇi saṃpravatsyati //
SA20bsa030_u:141: kleśācca duḥkhācca bibheti nāsau saṃpattikāle 'tha vipattikāle //
SA20bsa030_u:142: MSA_4.25 svakā guṇāḥ sattvahitācca modaḥ saṃcintyajanmarddhivikurvitaṃ ca /
SA20bsa030_u:144: MSA_4.26 parārthamudyogavataḥ kṛpātmano hyavīcirapyeti yato 'sya ramyatām /
SA20bsa030_u:147: parasya kṛtye samupasthite punaḥ paraiḥ samādāpanato 'tilajjanā //
SA20bsa030_u:156: MSA_5.2 paratralabdhvātmasamānacittatāṃ svato 'dhi vā śreṣṭhatareṣṭatāṃ pare /
SA20bsa030_u:158: MSA_5.3 paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇāripau /
SA20bsa030_u:159: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate //
SA20bsa030_u:163: tathāgatajñānamanuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:165: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattiruttamā //
SA20bsa030_u:166: MSA_5.7 mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:167: pratisvamādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhiga[śa]me kṛpātmakaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:168: MSA_5.8 jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārthamudyataḥ sadā tadaprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām /
SA20bsa030_u:169: sadā tu dhīro hi parārthamudyato dvayārthamādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim //
SA20bsa030_u:170: MSA_5.9 yathā yathā hyakṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:172: MSA_5.10 sadā 'svatantrīkṛtadoṣacetane jane na saṃdoṣamupaiti buddhimān /
SA20bsa030_u:173: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:180: MSA_6.1 na sanna cāsanna tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate /
SA20bsa030_u:181: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punarviśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇam //
SA20bsa030_u:182: MSA_6.2 na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā /
SA20bsa030_u:183: dvayānna cānyad bhrama eṣata[tū]ditastataśca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:184: MSA_6.3 kathaṃ jano vibhramamātramāśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām /
SA20bsa030_u:185: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:186: MSA_6.4 pratītyabhāvaprabhave kathaṃ janaḥ samakṣavṛttiḥ śrayate 'nyakāritam /
SA20bsa030_u:188: MSA_6.5 ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha /
SA20bsa030_u:189: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām //
SA20bsa030_u:190: MSA_6.6 saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāramanantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisattvaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:192: MSA_6.7 arthānsa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre /
SA20bsa030_u:194: MSA_6.8 nāstīti cittātparametya buddhyā cittasya nāstitvamupaiti tasmāt /
SA20bsa030_u:196: MSA_6.9 akalpanājñānabalena dhīmataḥ samānuyātena samantataḥ sadā /
SA20bsa030_u:209: buddhāṃśca sattvāṃśca sa dikṣu gatvā saṃmānayatyānayate viśuddhim //
SA20bsa030_u:211: saṃdarśayatyeva ca tānyatheṣṭaṃ vaśī vicitrairapi sa prakāraiḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:218: MSA_7.8 śakto bhavatyeva ca satvapāke saṃjātapakṣaḥ śakuniryathaiva /
SA20bsa030_u:220: MSA_7.9 ṣaḍdhāpyabhijñā trividhā ca vidyā aṣṭau vimokṣā 'bhibhuvastathā'ṣṭau /
SA20bsa030_u:222: MSA_7.10 sa hi paramavaśitvalabdhabuddhirjagadavaśaṃ svavaśe vidhāya nityam /
SA20bsa030_u:228: MSA_8.1 rūciḥ prasādaḥ praśamo 'nukampanā kṣamātha medhā prabalatvameva ca /
SA20bsa030_u:233: jinātmaje śāstari saṃprapattaye mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam //
SA20bsa030_u:236: MSA_8.5 kṛpā prakṛtyā paraduḥkhadarśanaṃ nihīnacittasya ca saṃpravarjanam /
SA20bsa030_u:238: MSA_8.6 dhṛtiḥ prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyabhāvanā sudaḥkhaśītādyadhivāsanā sadā /
SA20bsa030_u:242: MSA_8.8 śubhadvayena dvayadhātupuṣṭatā phalodaye cāśrayayogyatā parā /
SA20bsa030_u:250: MSA_8.12 vraṇe 'pi bhojye paripāka iṣyate yathaiva tatsrāvaṇabhogayogyatā /
SA20bsa030_u:252: MSA_8.13 vipācanoktā paripācanā tathā prapācanā cāpyanupācanāparā /
SA20bsa030_u:254: MSA_8.14 hitāśayeneha yathā jinātmajo vyavasthitaḥ sarvajagadvipācayan /
SA20bsa030_u:255: tathā na mātā na pitā na bandhavaḥ suteṣu bandhuṣvapi suvyavasthitāḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:256: MSA_8.15 tathājano nātmani vatsalo mataḥ kuto 'pi susnigdhaparāśraye jane /
SA20bsa030_u:257: yathā kṛpātmā parasatvavatsalo hite sukhe caiva niyojanātmataḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:258: MSA_8.16 na bodhisattvasya śarīrabhogayoḥ pareṣvadeyaṃ punarasti sarvathā /
SA20bsa030_u:259: anugraheṇa dvividhena pācayan paraṃ samairdānaguṇairna tṛpyate //
SA20bsa030_u:260: MSA_8.17 sadāprakṛtyādhyavihiṃsakaḥ svayaṃ rato 'pramatto 'tra paraṃ niveśayan /
SA20bsa030_u:264: MSA_8.19 punaḥ sa yatnaṃ paramaṃ samāśrito na khidyate kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:265: jinātmajaḥ sa[ttva]gaṇaṃ prapācayan paraikacittasya śubhasya kāraṇāt //
SA20bsa030_u:266: MSA_8.20 vaśitvamāgamya manasyanuttaraṃ paraṃ samāvarjayate 'tra śāsane /
SA20bsa030_u:267: nihatya sarvāmavamānakāmatāṃ śubhena saṃvardhayate ca taṃ punaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:268: MSA_8.21 sa tatvabhāvārthanaye suniścitaḥ karoti satvānsuvinīta saṃśayān /
SA20bsa030_u:269: tataśca te tajjinaśāsanādarād vivardhayante svaparaṃ guṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:270: iti sugatigatau śubhatraye vā jagadakhilaṃ kṛpayā sa bodhisattvaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:281: MSA_9.3 kṛtvā duṣkaramadbhutaṃ śramaśataiḥ saṃcityasarvaśubhaṃ kālenottamakalpayānamahatā sarvāvṛtīnāṃ kṣayāt /
SA20bsa030_u:282: sūkṣmasyāvaraṇasya bhūmiṣu gatasyotpāṭanād buddhatā ratnānāmiva sā prabhāvamahatāṃ peṭā samuddhāti[ṭi?]tā //
SA20bsa030_u:283: MSA_9.4 sarvadharmāśca buddhatvaṃ dharmo naiva na kaścana /
SA20bsa030_u:287: MSA_9.6 buddhatvaṃ sarvadharmaḥ samuditamatha vā sarvadharmavyapetaṃ prodbhūterdharmaratnapratatasumahato dharmaratnākarābham /
SA20bsa030_u:295: MSA_9.10 bauddhairdharmairyacca susaṃpūrṇaśarīraṃ yatsaddharme vetti sa sattvānpravinetum /
SA20bsa030_u:296: yātaṃ pāraṃ yatkṛpayā sarvajagatsu tad buddhatvaṃ śreṣṭhamihatyaṃ[heṣṭaṃ] śaraṇānām //
SA20bsa030_u:299: MSA_9.12 kleśajñeyavṛtīnāṃ satatamanugataṃ bījamutkṛṣṭakālaṃ yasminnastaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:301: MSA_9.13 sthitaśca tasminsa tathāgato jaganmahācalendrastha ivābhyudīkṣate /
SA20bsa030_u:302: śamābhirāmaṃ karūṇāyate janamaghā[bhavā]bhirāme 'nyajane tu kā kathā //
SA20bsa030_u:305: MSA_9.15 yathāmbaraṃ sarvagataṃ sadāmataṃ tathaiva tatsarvagataṃ sadāmatam /
SA20bsa030_u:306: yathāmbaraṃ rūpagaṇeṣu sarvagaṃ tathaiva tatsatvagaṇeṣu sarvagam //
SA20bsa030_u:307: MSA_9.16 yathodabhājane bhinne candrabimbaṃ na dṛśyate /
SA20bsa030_u:308: tatha duṣṭeṣu sattveṣu buddhabimbaṃ na dṛśyate //
SA20bsa030_u:315: MSA_9.20 yathākāśe avicchinnā dṛśyante lokataḥ kriyāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:317: MSA_9.21 yathākāśe kriyāṇāṃ hi hānirabhyudayaḥ sadā /
SA20bsa030_u:320: naśuddhā nāpi cāśuddhā tathatā buddhatā matā //
SA20bsa030_u:323: MSA_9.24 na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvo buddhatvaṃ tena kathyate /
SA20bsa030_u:325: MSA_9.25 dāhaśāntiryathā lohe darśane timirasya ca /
SA20bsa030_u:326: cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate //
SA20bsa030_u:327: MSA_9.26 buddhānāmamale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca /
SA20bsa030_u:342: sakṛt jñeyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ buddhajñānaiḥ prabhāsyate //
SA20bsa030_u:359: MSA_9.42 manaso 'pi parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param /
SA20bsa030_u:363: MSA_9.44 vikalpasya parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param /
SA20bsa030_u:365: MSA_9.45 pratiṣṭhāyāḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param /
SA20bsa030_u:367: MSA_9.46 maithunasya parāvṛttau vibhutvaṃ labhyate param /
SA20bsa030_u:373: MSA_9.49 śubhe vṛddho loko vrajati suviśuddhau paramatāṃ śubhe cānārabdhvā vrajati śubhavṛddhau paramatām /
SA20bsa030_u:374: vrajatyevaṃ loko diśi diśi jinānāṃ sukathitair apakvaḥ pakvo vā [na]ca punaraśeṣaṃ dhruvamiha //
SA20bsa030_u:375: MSA_9.50 tathā kṛtvā caryāṃ [kṛcchrāvāpyāṃ] paramaguṇayogādbhutavartī mahābodhiṃ nityāṃ dhruvamaśaraṇānāṃ ca śaraṇam /
SA20bsa030_u:376: labhante yaddhīrā [diśi diśi] gasadā [sadā]sarvasamayaṃ tadāścaryaṃ loke suvidhacaraṇānnādbhutamapi //
SA20bsa030_u:377: MSA_9.51 kvaciddharmāñcakaṃ [dharmyaṃ cakraṃ] bahumukhaśatairdarśayati yaḥ kvacijjanmāntardhiṃ kvacidapi vicitrāṃ janacarīm /
SA20bsa030_u:378: kvacitkṛtsnāṃ bodhiṃ kvacidapi ca nirvāṇamasakṛt na ca sthānāttasmādvicalati sa sarvaṃ ca kurute //
SA20bsa030_u:379: MSA_9.52 na buddhānāmevaṃ bhavati mamapakvo 'yamiti cāprapācyo 'yaṃ dehī api ca adhunāpācyata iti /
SA20bsa030_u:380: vinā saṃskāraṃ tu prapacamupayātyeva janatā śubhairdharmairnityaṃ diśi diśiḥ samantāttrayamukham //
SA20bsa030_u:381: MSA_9.53 yathāyatnaṃ bhānuḥ pratataviṣadairaṃśavisaraiḥ prapāka[kaṃ] sasyānāṃ diśi [diśi] samantātprakurūte /
SA20bsa030_u:382: tathā dharmārko 'pi praśamavidhidharmāṃśuvisaraiḥ prapākaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantātprakurūte //
SA20bsa030_u:383: MSA_9.54 yathaikasmāddīpādbhavati sumahāndīpanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca sa punareti vyayamataḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:384: tathaikasmād buddhād [pākā]bhavati sumahān paripāka[pāka]nicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca punareti[punarupaiti] vyayamataḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:385: MSA_9.55 yathā toyaistṛptiṃ vrajati na mahāsāgara iva na vṛddhiṃ vā yāti pratataviṣadāmbu praviśanaiḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:386: tathā bauddhau dhātuḥ satatasamitaiḥ śuddhiviśanair natṛptiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā vrajati paramāścaryamiha tat //
SA20bsa030_u:399: MSA_9.62 samaḥ sūkṣmaśca tacchiṣṭaḥ[cchliṣṭaḥ] kāyaḥ svābhāviko mataḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:401: MSA_9.63 ameyaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ kāyo nairmāṇiko mataḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:405: MSA_9.65 tribhiḥ kāyaistu vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:407: MSA_9.66 āśrayeṇāśayenāpi karmaṇā te samā matāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:435: MSA_9.80 paśyatāṃ gurutvaṃ [tāṃ] dīrghaṃ nimittaṃ vīryamātmanaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:439: MSA_9.82 bhinnāśrayā bhinnajalāśca nadyaḥ alpodakāḥ kṛtyapṛthaktvakāryāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:441: MSA_9.83 samudraviṣṭāśca bhavanti sarvā ekāśrayā ekamahājalāśca /
SA20bsa030_u:443: MSA_9.84 bhinnāśrayā bhinnamatāśca dhīrāḥ svalpāvabodhāḥ pṛthagātmakṛtyāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:445: MSA_9.85 buddhatvaviṣṭāśca bhavanti sarve ekāśrayā ekamahāvabodhāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:446: miśrekakāryāśca mahopabhogyāḥ sadā mahāsatvagaṇasya te hi //
SA20bsa030_u:453: MSA_10.1 ādiḥ siddhiḥ śaraṇaṃ gotraṃ citte tathaiva cotpādaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:455: MSA_10.2 jātā jātā grāhikā grāhyabhūtā mitrādāttā svātmato bhrāntikā ca /
SA20bsa030_u:456: abhrāntānyā āmukhā naiva cānyā ghoṣācārā caiṣikā cekṣikā ca //
SA20bsa030_u:457: MSA_10.3 hāryā kīrṇā'vyāvakīrṇā vipakṣairhīnodārā āvṛtā'nāvṛtā ca /
SA20bsa030_u:458: yuktā'yuktā saṃbhṛtā'saṃbhṛtā ca gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā dūragā cādhimuktiḥ //

SA20bsa030_u:1127: MSA_17.37 mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet /

SA20bsa030_u:1131: MSA_17.39 karuṇāseko maitrī tadduḥkhe saukhyato vipulapuṣṭiḥ /

SA20bsa030_u:1145: MSA_17.46 duḥkhābhāve duḥkhaṃ yatkṛpayā bhavati bodhisattvānāṃ /

SA20bsa030_u:1151: MSA_17.49 duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati satvārthaṃ /

SA20bsa030_u:1157: MSA_17.52 duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhānyanādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa030_u:1159: MSA_17.53 svaṃ dānaṃ kārūṇikaḥ śāstīva sadaiva niḥsvasukhakāmaḥ /

SA20bsa030_u:1542: MSA_19.56 paripācyaṃ viśodhyaṃ ca prāpyaṃ yogyaṃ ca pācane /

SA20bsa030_u:1656: sarvaṃ puṇyasamuccayaṃ suvipulaṃ kṛtvānyasādhāraṇaṃ saṃbodhau pariṇāmayatyaharaharyo hyuttamopāyavit /
SA20bsa030_u:1657: MSA_20.30 jātaḥ svāyatane sadā śubhakaraḥ krīḍatyabhijñāguṇaiḥ sarveṣāmuparisthito guṇanidhirjñeyaḥ sa buddhātmanaḥ //
SA20bsa030_u:1658: MSA_20.31 śamathe vipaśyanāyāṃ ca dvayapañcātmako mataḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1660: MSA_20.32 paśyatāṃ bodhimāsannāṃ satvārthasya ca sādhanaṃ /
SA20bsa030_u:1661: tīvra utpadyate modo muditā tena kathyate //
SA20bsa030_u:1664: MSA_20.34 arcirbhūtā yato dharmā bodhipakṣāḥ pradāhakāḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1666: MSA_20.35 satvānāṃ paripākaśca svacittasya ca rakṣaṇā /
SA20bsa030_u:1686: jñānena jñeyaṃ vyāptaṃ te muktacitta namo 'stute //
SA20bsa030_u:1691: MSA_20.47 āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
SA20bsa030_u:1693: MSA_20.48 upetya vacanaisteṣāṃ carijña āgatau gatau /
SA20bsa030_u:1694: niḥ sāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te //
SA20bsa030_u:1695: MSA_20.49 satpauruṣyaṃ prapadyante tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvadehinaḥ /
SA20bsa030_u:1699: MSA_20.51 upāye śaraṇe śuddhau satvānāṃ vipravādane /
SA20bsa030_u:1700: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te //
SA20bsa030_u:1706: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te //
